Text: Thanks! How is the sound quality?
Thanks for the up, but if the source is a DVD-Screener, why up-sample it to 1280x536?  Doesn't that just increase the file-size for no visual benefit?

The file lags in the first few minutes and can't play from there without the sound and action not in sync. Hassle of a file which is too big for a screener. Why can't anyone just upload avi or mp4 files which is more convenient to play. Appreciate the effort though.
